featured.text: I tried one when I was a prep cook for Next Level Burgers…tasted awful, just like mashed peas gone to rot.
However, they cannot 20 the personal attention coming from the distinctive tap of a pea shooter.
17 sticks or pea shooters, the human alarms would tour the streets, tap on windows, or blast them with dried peas, trying to wake paying customers in time for work.
Whether they wielded rods or pea shooters, knockers-up became 18 throughout the United Kingdom.

definition.zh_def: 豌豆，一種小而圓的綠色豆類，通常用作食物。
definition.en_def: A small, round, green seed that is eaten as a vegetable.
definition.example: She added peas to the salad for extra color and nutrition.
